name: out of cont-ROLL
description:
Controls: A, D, SPACE, F

On game load, angle the descent of your boulder by pressing A and D to move left and right respectively.

Press Space to Launch your boulder

Once the boulder comes to a stop you can roll another up to 3 times total. Get the highest score by smashing objects. 

If the boulder is taking too long to stop press F to go to the next roll.

Refresh the browser window to restart.
